## AddedItem type

Represents an Item added to a {<!-- -->Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.TranslationJob<!-- -->}<!-- -->.The item added to a Translation Job is not necessarily the item that is send for translation. For example, if a Page is added without specifying the TranslateParentItems flag in the , the Components on the Page are included in the Translation Job but the Page itself will not.To change the items included in the Translation Job directly, use a Tridion Sites event subscription with the event arguments.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AddedItem = {
    IdRef?: string;
    Title?: string;
    ItemTypeWithSubtype?: string;
    ResolveOptions?: Array<ResolveOptions>;
};
```

**References:** [ResolveOptions](./open-api-client.resolveoptions.md)
